if(NOT EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/libmysofa)
	message("libmysofa sub project not available. Starting script to download it.") 
	if(${JVX_OS} MATCHES "windows" OR ${JVX_OS} MATCHES "macosx")
		execute_process(COMMAND ${mysh} -c "cd ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} ; ./prepareModules-win.sh; exit")
	else()
		execute_process(COMMAND ${mysh} -c "cd ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} ; ./prepareModules-glnx.sh; exit")
	endif()
	message("libmysofa installation complete.")
endif()

add_subdirectory(./libmysofa)
